fix.changed: Fixed outgoing notifications messages for different languages, thanks to @bri2

minorChanges.changed: Added enter command after find in stash command executes.

fix.changed: Fixed tooltips not hiding

minorChanges.changed: Added option in general settings to hide toolbar when mouse isn't over it

fix.changed: Fixed price going offscreen (nickname is shown shorter now, when you place mouse on name it will show full name)
Fixed automatic whisper helper, It shouldn't refresh website (Still if you click few times before message is send the issue will occur)

minorChanges.changed: Check for updates, will now show if you have newest version without going to github. (You still need to download it manually)

fix.changed: Removed sending pushbullet notification on outgoing notifications
Fixed high cpu usage
Fixed tutorial window not resizable
Fixed history file parsing
Fixed overlay capture feature
Fixed saving configuration on pushbullet on/off switch
Fixed errors while item image was not found
Added base currency images for pathofexile.com/trade
Fixed error when item name containted 'in' message was wrongly parsed
Added max heap size to .exe runner to limit memory usage
Added better garbage collector to .exe runner to reduce cpu load
Updated betrayal chart for 3.17 (You are still able to replace that image, more in README.txt
Changed message ui to be more readable when transaction item does not have image
Fixed errors on higher jdk than 1.8 (tested on 17)
Fixed loading error when betrayal image was deleted

features.changed: Added possibility to change betrayal image for any image you want. Read more in README file located in MercuryTrade/resources/app

fix.changed: Fixed error with showing popups after year change
Fixed error which prevented to use openjdk (You still need to use java 1.8)
Fixed infinite mercury trade icon loading while error occured
Removed option to kick player on same click when response message is sended (it was 2 server actions per 1 player action)

features.changed: Added support for pushbullet notifications. Check 'General' section in Settings for API key.

fix.changed: Fixed persistent tooltips error
Fixed notifications not showing in specific circumstances (works only for downward direction of notifications)
Fixed Notification positioning
Fixed issues which caused error 'Not supported OS' to be thrown
Fixed startup issues on Linux and macOS

features.changed: Automatic hotkeyless whisper after copy trade message is now available
Changing sounds of notification is now available (check README.txt in MercuryTrade/resources/app

fix.changed: Fixed part of keyboard not working when using Portuguese (Brazil) language
Showing items when they are placed into quad tabs

features.changed: When stash tab is open and name of item is pressed in notification window it will be copied into stash tab search
Added rational fractions instead of decimal ratios while buying/selling currency

minorChanges.changed: Added changelog into "About" section including releases from 1.1.0

fix.changed: Fixed restoring default location of windows
Updated dependencies (security reasons)

features.changed: Added Vulkan support, it's possible to turn it on from tray settings icon or from settings menu of MT
Added button to dismiss all stash tabs options from grid aligner

minorChanges.changed: Added support for poemap.live bulk trades
Added access to settings from tray menu

fix.changed: Leaving party button when outgoing message was send was trying to kick other player not yourself
Fixed infinite Loading on Startup
Updated dependencies for security reasons
Fixed naming of messages kick feature from release 1.1.0
Fixed incoming/outgoing messages for poemap.live
Fixed occasional crashes
Fixed issue with nullpointer exception while message was corrupted

features.changed: Added kick/leave feature which can be set up for incoming messages responses

minorChanges.changed: Changed font size of game path to make it more readable
Deleted all paypal and discord links
Changed github repo links from Exslims to this Fork
Disabled not working update service (startup is faster now)
